title: Minecraft 1.11将会更新：大羊驼，豪宅，和地图
author: Wolverine
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wolverine 于 2016-9-26 17:16 编辑 



Grand development wizard Jens has unveiled a slew of awesome new things coming in the next update of PC / Mac edition - dubbed “The Exploration Update”. And with good reason, as you shall find out.
Mojang团队的首席开发人员 Jeb大大 亮相了一系列的新特性。全部都会在下一个版本（1.11）里加入。称之为：“探索更新”。快去找到属于你自己的答案吧。



The update introduces the Illagers - a new bunch of mobs who inhabit Woodland Mansions. They’re a mean lot who attack intruders with deadly magic and summon mischievous flying imps called Vexes.
本次更新新增了 Illagers - 是一些居住于林地豪宅的生物。它们会使用一种致命的魔法（译者注：大概理解为药水效果）攻击入侵者，并且会召唤很多会飞的调皮小鬼，称之为：“Vexes”。 

True to the update’s name, you can now buy maps from village Cartographers which will lead you to Ocean Monuments and Woodland Mansions. There be treasure!
正如标题所示，玩家们现在可以从制图师（一种村民）手中购买不同的地图。其中包括通往海洋纪念碑和林地豪宅的地图。



You will also be able to manage your bloated inventory with Shulker Boxes - special chests that retain their contents even when knocked down.
玩家们现在可以通过潜影贝盒子整理自己乱七八糟的背包。潜影贝盒子是一种即使被破坏也仍然可以保存物品的特殊箱子。

And let’s not forget the fluffiest of 1.11’s additions: llamas! They’re basically adorable mobile chests. Stick a carpet on them to make ‘em snazzy. They’ll even form caravans as you lead them across the land and attack hostile mobs with gobs of spit. Charming!
不要忘记 1.11 蓬松的新特性：大羊驼！他们就像是一个移动中的可爱箱子。加上地毯可以让它们变得更时髦。在旅途当中，亦或者是在攻击敌对生物时，它们还可以当作大篷车来使用。挺迷人的！



There’s quite a lot more in the works: check out the changelog when the snapshot arrives this coming Wednesday!
还有很多未介绍的新特性：本周三会有一个更新日志，别忘了关注哦！
